#summary SQL Delete
#labels sql

The *SQL Delete* command deletes one or more records into the database. The set of records envolved are taken by the [SQLWhere WHERE] clause.

== Syntax ==

{{{DELETE FROM <Class>|cluster:<cluster>|index:<index> [WHERE <condition>*]}}}

The [SQLWhere WHERE] clause is common to the other SQL commands.

== Examples ==

Delete all the records with surname equals to 'unknown' ignoring the case:

{{{delete from Profile where surname.toLowerCase() = 'unknown' }}}


To know more about other SQL commands look at [SQL SQL commands].
